column1:
Odeinoichus,"2021-01-31T18:19:28.777Z","Nice Polybag with Book.","

Set #11920 Star Wars: Build Your Own Adventure Galactic Missions parts: This is a polybag included with the second Build Your Own Adventure Book from 2019 and includes the parts necessary to build a ‘Microfighter’ style Twin-Pod Cloud Car. It includes a single Minifigure and a very decent model.

column2: • Difficult to find outside of book stores.

column1: This set is a decent item included with the book. The book has a lot of great ideas in it, as we have covered in the book review itself. There isn’t much to this set, it’s a Polybag with parts and a Minifigure. I’d recommend picking up the book if you can find it for a good price. The cost of these books can be rather high compared to other books, but as always if you can find them at Costco you can get them for half price. Recommended.
